data.name: FortiGuard Labs | FortiGuard Center - IR Advisories
data.description: The following is a list of advisories for issues resolved in Fortinet products. The resolution of such issues is coordinated by the Fortinet Product Security Incident Response Team (PSIRT), a dedicated, global team that manages the receipt, investigation, and public reporting of information about security vulnerabilities and issues related to Fortinet products and services.
